# CollisionCastQueryType.any

**Case**

Report one hit.

## Declaration

```swift
case any
```

## Discussion

This query type typically executes fastest, but doesn’t guarantee anything about which hit it returns. If you need the hit closest to the origin of the cast, use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionCastQueryType/nearest] instead.

## Collision cast queries

- **CollisionCastQueryType.nearest**: Report the closest hit.
- **CollisionCastQueryType.all**: Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.

items.description: Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.
items.name: CollisionCastQueryType.all

title: CollisionCastQueryType.any
